name: Euro Youth Mental Health
memberOrga: I think if what you are after, is 'natural person's' who are part of our network - there are other volunteers in the organisation, as opposed to myself and Irina who are legal entities of the organisation also.
goal:
We are a Non-Governmental Organisation currently run by passionate and enthusiastic young people who volunteer in order to share their expertise and experiences to improve the support young people across Europe to have happy and healthy futures.

We act in order to create a Europe that enables young people to access support and talk openly about their mental health and well-being. By encouraging collaboration across services, sharing of best-practice and ensuring that young people are empowered to have a voice in all matters that affect them around the promotion of mental health and preventing the impact of mental illness.
interests: Culture, Culture and media, Digital economy and society, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, Institutional affairs, International co-operation and development, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Public Health, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Youth
euInitiatives: Nothing specific at present as there isn't many, if any initiatives around mental health, especially with young people.
